tr.td:
Date of Encounter: 2015-06-22 Plan: The patient was found to have fever and Dr. Davis is suspecting Anemia based on the patient history. So Dr. Davis asked the patient to closely monitor the temperature and blood pressure and get admitted to Community Health Hospitals if the fever does not subside within a day.
Get an EKG done on 6/23/2015; Get a Chest X-ray done on 6/23/2015 showing the Lower Respiratory Tract Structure; Take Clindamycin 300mg three times a day as needed if pain does not subside; Schedule follow on visit with Neighborhood Physicians Practice on 7/1/2015.
Future Scheduled Tests: Urinalysis macro (dipstick) panel - Urine Expected results on: 2018-06-29
CefTRIAXone Sodium 100 GM Injection Solution Reconstituted
Tylenol Extra Strength 500 MG Oral Tablet
Take 1 tablet (500 mg) by mouth every 6 hours as needed
Aranesp (Albumin Free) 500 MCG/ML Injection Solution Prefilled Syringe

text.paragraph: To: Gina Davis Fax: (555)555-0001 Content: Ms Alice Newman is being referred to Community Health Hospitals Inpatient facility because of the high fever noticed and suspected Anemia.

tr.td: Get rid of intermittent fever that is occurring every few weeks.
Need to gain more energy to do regular activities.
Note: Chronic sickness exhibited in patient; HealthCare Concerns refer to underlying clinical facts: Documented HyperTension problem; Documented HypoThyroidism problem; Watch weight of patient.
